title: [Large-Scale] Science Foundational Competency Enhancement MOOC for Adult Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Awareness of the necessity for foundational understanding in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Practical learning design considering real-world task integration for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core scientific concepts with ≥80% accuracy.

Learners can apply the scientific methodology (problem definition → hypothesis formulation → data collection → analysis → verification) to real-world workplace problems (e.g., manufacturing process optimization, quality control issues) and propose three or more solutions while validating their feasibility through experimental or simulation results.
Learners improve their learning content by ≥90% based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
